TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit QueryPageSettingsEventArgs extends System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 很可能要列印的文件使用不同頁面設定每一頁。It is possible to print each page of a document using different page settings. 您可以設定頁面設定所修改的個別屬性屬性或屬性設定為。You set page settings by modifying individual properties of the property or by setting the property to a . 也可以藉由設定取消列印工作屬性`true`。The print job can also be canceled by setting the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列印文件的第一頁中的色彩，如果印表機支援它。The following code example prints a document with the first page in color, if the printer supports it. 此範例假設名為變數`printDoc`已建立，而和被處理的事件。The example assumes that a variable named `printDoc` has been created, and the and events are handled. 使用和此範例中的命名空間。Use the and namespaces for this example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 很可能要列印的文件使用不同頁面設定每一頁。It is possible to print each page of a document using different page settings. 您可以設定頁面設定所修改的個別屬性屬性或屬性設定為。You set page settings by modifying individual properties of the property or by setting the property to a . 也可以藉由設定取消列印工作屬性`true`。The print job can also be canceled by setting the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列印文件的第一頁中的色彩，如果印表機支援它。The following code example prints a document with the first page in color, if the printer supports it. 此範例假設名為變數`printDoc`已建立，而和被處理的事件。The example assumes that a variable named `printDoc` has been created, and the and events are handled. 使用和此範例中的命名空間。Use the and namespaces for this example.
